pia.servlet

Class BaseServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • pia.servlet.BaseServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccHistory, Confirm, ConfirmLogin, Contacts, DeleteTempl, DeleteUser, Edit, HelloWorldServlet, Login, Logout, Payment, PdfServlet, Profile, Registration, TemplateC, TemplateList, TemplateServ, TransactionServ, Update, UserL

    @WebServlet(name="BaseServlet")
public class BaseServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Base servlet every other servlet extends this one Created by jakub on 20.01.2017.
